Package cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.authentication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAuthenticationService
    Defines authentication service interface
    Visitable
    Declares method to accept visitor.
    Visitor
    Declares methods to visit user, service, role, permission and access token.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationService
    This class implements IAuthenticationService interface.
    AuthenticationServiceFactory
    The public class which acts as a factory of authentication service object.
    Entitlement
    This acts as base class for roles and permissions.
    PrintInfoVisitor
    Concrete implementation of visitor interface> the purpose of the visitor class is to print the objects information on standard output.
    RoleIterator
    Iterator class for iterating roles
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Entitlement.TYPE  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccessDeniedException
    Represents exception class when user is not permitted to invoke any restricted method.
    AuthenticationException
    Represents exception class when user’s credentials are wrong during login
    InvalidAccessTokenException
    Represents exception class when user tries to invoke a method but token is invalid.
